component.name: fetchNotes
component.description: This method use to retrieve all the notes existing

component.name: fetchNotesById
component.description: This method use to retrieve a specific note using it unique identifier.

component.name: retrieveNotes
component.description: This method use to fetch all of the notes that are accessible by the user.

component.name: createNotes
component.description: This method use to create a note.

component.name: updateNotesById
component.description: This method use to Update a existing note with new properties, these properties will be saved to the database and the new note will be returned..

component.name: deleteNotesById
component.description: This method use to delete a existing note.
